manpage.title: iscntrl iswcntrl

description.para: Returns true if c is a control character.

return.para: If c is a control character, then iscntrl returns a non-zero value (0x00 - 0x1F or 0x7F). It returns 0 if c does not satisfy the test condition.

manpage.result: c is a Ctrl character. d is not a Ctrl character.
